TextView.android:text: Finland is rated #1 on the Environmental Performance Index with a score of 90.68! This rating is based on a countries performance in protection of human health and in protection of ecosystems. There are over 20 different ratings that combine into a countries EPI score, including various measurements on human and animal health, air and water quality, and climate and energy protocols. Finland's citizens do an excellent job recycling, especially with glass bottles. Finland has a 100% recycle rate on refillable glass bottles, and over 90% recycle rate on cans, plastics and paper!
